author: AP
title: In The Pits: NASCAR facing big decision on when to race
description: Teams are struggling to stay afloat during NASCAR's coronavirus shutdown
content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — The virtual racing has been cute and kept everyone entertained but NASCAR needs to get back to the real thing, quickly, for the financial and mental health of the sport. 
NASCAR — really, almost all levels of professional racing — is n… [+3962 chars]
